fields.headline: Howell has it all
fields.bodyText: If you're interested in following the various debates here at the business blogging conference, Denise Howell is sitting a few seats down from me, furiously typing a very detailed transcript of proceedings. Denise, you may recall, made some headlines recently for blogging proceedings at a conference where the journalists had been muzzled by agreeing to keeping everything off the record. The organisors had not, alas, told the audience. Dan Gillmor had some interesting thoughts on that at the time.
